title: Vicky Pattison will freeze her eggs to take pressure off Ercan Ramadan romance

Vicky Pattison has decided to freeze her eggs in a bid to take the pressure off her new relationship.

The former Geordie Shore original is only 31 but wants to take "precautions" to ensure she has the option to have children one day.

Vicky is currently dating Ercan Ramadan, 36, who she went official with in February - just three months after her heart was broken by ex-fiance John Noble.

Speaking on her new reality series Vicky Pattison: No Filter, the Geordie lass confirmed she'd changed her mind about not wanting kids.

"I have never, ever known a fella worry about having kids. But women, God, I don't know how many women I've had that conversation with," she said.

(Image: instagram/Forever Sewing)

"I am going to want to have kids in the next five to 10 years.

"I didn't want kids and I was adamant I didn't, but I feel like what would my future be without them?"

Vicky then revealed she'd be open to the idea of having medical intervention in order to preserve her eggs.

"I don't want the door to close. There's options. So, I can freeze my eggs," she went on.

"I just think it’ll take a little bit of pressure off the way I'm feeling.

(Image: Vicky Pattison/Instagram)

"I'd love to have children the traditional way, I'm just taking precautions."

Vicky and Ercan's relationship is going from strength to strength, and they even moved in together after eight months of dating.

"I'm feeling super chilled this time around and am falling back in love with wellness which I think is the key – how can you expect someone to love you if you don’t love yourself?" she captioned a snap of them together just last week.

The I'm A Celeb star recently spoke about the good qualities Ercan possesses.

Speaking to The Sun, Vicky gushed about the man she claims helped "put her back together".

(Image: viclkypattison/Instagram)

She excitedly said: "I know it probably sounds really sickly, but he's just so nice.

"I've never gone out with someone really nice before. I didn't know fellas like this existed."

Vicky had her first date with Ercan at celebrity haunt Nobu, and described "feeling tiny sparks" the first time he touched her hand.

The TV personality claimed she had intended to remain single for some time after her engagement was called off, but revealed it was Ercan's perseverance and patience following her heartbreak that won her over.

Describing him as "kind and tentative", Vicky said he had also won the affections of her whole family, adding: "I love him."
description: Ex-Geordie Shore star Vicky Pattison has done a 180 on her decision not to have kids - and now she's looking to 'take precautions'
